title: I like how people who avoid botters are punished
body:
Hey look, two people who instalock free champs with Ghost/Heal and don't say a word. Oh, two legitimate players are going to leave their pick empty to dodge the botters? Better give each of them a dodge penalty!

Riot, I hope you realize that botting happens because it works. People bot accounts to 30 with zero problems. Maybe you could go ahead and actually ban them instead of punishing everyone else? That would be great. And make sure it has a cover page.
